OAPs

Cinie Williams Ojeka

He's a dynamic presenter that speaks multiple Nigerian language. He is the host of The Sparkling Morning Show and Sports Cruise.

Gloria Umoh

She is the host of our flagship Efik show Mkpon Editi. She is also a great reporter that has passion for stories empowering women to aspire to leadership position.

Essien Okon Essien

Essien is a cornerstone of our Efik show Mkpo Editi. He is concerned about promoting the Efik culture and he is a community leader.

Miracle George

Popularly referred to a "George Talent". He is the host of our flagship pidgin belt "kpon kpo do". He also hosts the "Saturday Morning Show".
George is a comedian and events host.
